hero.title: AGORA
hero.subtitle: Apart Hotel
hero.description: Discover tranquility in the heart of the Mediterranean, within the unique atmosphere of Alanya.

about.title: A Boutique Experience Like No Other
about.description: Agora Apart Hotel is a boutique property in the heart of Alanya, combining home comfort with luxury details.
about.feature1_desc: Just a few steps away from the crystal waters of the Mediterranean.
about.feature2_desc: Savor world cuisine prepared by our master chefs.
about.feature3_desc: Our team is here for your needs at any hour of the day.

experiences.title: Curated Experiences
experiences.subtitle: Immerse yourself in unforgettable moments designed to inspire and rejuvenate.
experiences.item1_desc: An unforgettable day in the turquoise bays of the Mediterranean.
experiences.item2_desc: Refresh with a traditional Turkish bath ritual.
experiences.item3_desc: Comfortable and secure VIP transportation services.

rooms.title: Apartments & Suites
rooms.room1_desc: A spacious and modern accommodation experience against the unique view of the Taurus Mountains.
rooms.room2_desc: Feel the comfort of Agora Apart in its simplest form.

restaurant.title: A Journey Full of Flavor
restaurant.description: Our hotel combines traditional Turkish hospitality with a modern culinary approach.
restaurant.feature2: 09:00 - 23:00 Open All Week A La Carte Restaurant

contact.title: We Are Waiting For You
contact.description: You can contact us anytime for reservations and questions.

footer.description: A boutique stay in the heart of Alanya, blending peace and comfort.
